manual.title: Manually connect to the device
manual.description: No Roomba or Braava have been discovered on your network. Please follow the steps outlined in the documentation at: https://www.home-assistant.io/integrations/roomba/#retrieving-your-credentials

link.title: Retrieve Password
link.description: Press and hold the Home and Target buttons until the device generates a sound (about two seconds). Some devices may not have a target button.

link_manual.title: Retrieve Password
link_manual.description: The password could not be retrivied from the device automaticlly. Please follow the steps outlined in the documentation at: https://www.home-assistant.io/integrations/roomba/#retrieving-your-credentials
